mdRecord.dcterms:title: Johnson's Virginia, Delaware, Maryland & West Virginia
Virginia, Delaware, Maryland and West Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnson, A. J. (Alvin Jewett), 1827-1884 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Shows counties, railroads, and includes some counties of West Virginia, created in 1863. [original]
Relief shown by hachures. Depth shown by isolines. [original]
"Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1864, by A.J. Johnson, in the Clerk's Office of the District Court of the United States for the Southern District of New. [original]
Includes illustrations of "Fortress Monroe," "General post office," "Treasury buildings, "Patent Office, " and "University of Virginia." [original]
Plate numbers 33 & 34 printed in upper left and right corners, respectively. Text on verso: Geographical index, or Ready reference, p. 45-46. [original]
Map was issued with this plate number in: Johnson's new illustrated (steel plate) family atlas. New York : Johnson and Ward, 1865. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS. Imperfect: fragile with marginal chips and fold tears for both copies. [original]
